title: Brave
description: Courage means rising up to defend your beliefs...or daring to question them.Erin McIntyre was captivating, but forbiddenHis professional subordinateThe embodiment of unearned privilegeThe daughter of his sworn enemyIsaac Maat was impossible to readSmart, ambitious, and emotionally detachedHotter than anyone's boss should ever beAnd definitely hiding something...He told himself that getting to know her would help him take down her father.She told herself that getting under his skin would distract her wrecked heart from its misery.Neither predicted their private war would lead to an intimate battle in which the victor would be the first one to SURRENDER.
author: Tammara Webber
